Class HostRoomModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • RoomModule
      • HostRoomModule
  • public class HostRoomModule
extends RoomModule
    This class handles game connection from the host side. The host can start games. It extends from the super class RoomModule.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class RoomModule

        lobbyID, playerOrder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      HostRoomModule()  
      HostRoomModule​(int lobbyID)
      Class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void disconnect​(int userID)
      disconnect method disconnects the user from the lobby.
      void gameStart()
      gameStart method starts the game and updates database.
      void getUpdate​(AppController parent)
      getUpdate method updates the player list inside the lobby if order has changed.
      boolean joinRoom​(Lobby lobby, int userID)
      joinRoom method creates the game lobby, and joins the lobby as host.

      • joinRoom

        public boolean joinRoom​(Lobby lobby,
                        int userID)
        joinRoom method creates the game lobby, and joins the lobby as host.
        Specified by:
        joinRoom in class RoomModule
        Parameters:
        lobby - an object of the class lobby.
        userID - the host's userID.
        Returns:
        true on successful creation of lobby. False on failure.

      • getUpdate

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        parent - reference to AppController.

      • gameStart

        public void gameStart()
        gameStart method starts the game and updates database.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect​(int userID)
        disconnect method disconnects the user from the lobby. If lobby is empty, it gets deleted.
        Overrides:
        disconnect in class RoomModule
        Parameters:
        userID - player ID.
